headline: Apollo Explores Revolut Partnership as Wealth Revenue Jumps Nearly 300%
summary: Talks could bring Apollo funds to EU retail investors via Revolut's planned private markets platform launching later this year.

headline: Apollo Global Management (APO) Valuation Check After Q4 Beat Schroders Deal And EMEA Leadership Move
summary: Apollo Global Management (APO) is in focus after a cluster of updates, including Q4 earnings that beat expectations, a new Schroders partnership in wealth and retirement products, and senior leadership changes in its EMEA business. See our latest analysis for Apollo Global Management. Despite upbeat Q4 headlines, Apollo Global Management’s recent share price performance has cooled, with a 30 day share price return decline of 12.48% and a year to date share price return decline of 14.49%...
